tool.name: SAGA.pointcloud_tools.2
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayGRID False isArrayGRIDS True output_data_POINTS $output_data_POINTS name SAGA.pointcloud_tools.2 GRID $GRID GRIDS $GRIDS prefer $prefer response $response outputType_POINTS $OutputSection_POINTS.outputType_POINTS transmissionMode_POINTS $OutputSection_POINTS.transmissionMode_POINTS

param.name: GRID
param.label: Z Value
param.help: Z Value The following data types are allowed in the txt file: png, x-ogc-envi, x-ogc-aaigrid, tiff

param.name: GRIDS
param.label: Additional Values
param.help: Additional Values The following data types are allowed in the txt file: png, x-ogc-envi, x-ogc-aaigrid, tiff

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_POINTS
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value
